title: How to prevent physical damage to the USB during removal - Quora

response.answer_text: Do not plug in or out your USB devices at angles or do not scratch or force your USB devices into the port. This will do the best to prevent physical damage. If you are very conscious abiut this, buy a USB hub and plug that USB hub to one of the USB ports and do not remove it until the hib is damaged. So if you however damage your usb ports, it will be of the usb Hub and not the main port.
